title: Ordinary Guy In Apocalypse - Novel Updates
tags: Apocalypse   Evolution   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Mutations   Polite Protagonist   Reincarnation   System Administrator   Zombies
author: 新丰
description:
Zombie: 'Roar!'

Lin Fan: 'We are all neighbors, why do you have to be so irascible?'

Lin Fan: 'I do not have time for you, I have to go to the store to buy some stuff.'

Looking at Xiao Qing, who had already turned into a zombie, Lin Fan said, 'Xiao Qing, I bought a few bottles of water, I have already scanned the QR code.'

'Boss, I want to get my wage for this time's work.'

Sunshine Neighborhood, the neighborhood that Lin Fan lives in, countless survivors flock there to seek protection.

In a world where zombies run amock, we have to learn from Lin Fan on how to be a good and outstanding citizen.

Abide by the laws, earn money by working, and strive to buy a house and a car with your hard-earned money.>
